languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс кашляет и тихо, едва слышно оттарабанивает:{/n} "Она из хладных торговцев — контрабандистов, промышляющих ксенотоварами. Помимо этой ереси о других, более тяжелых прегрешениях в ее исполнении не слышал".
{n}Heinrix coughs and says quickly and quietly,{/n} "She's a Cold Trader, a smuggler who deals in xenos artefacts. Apart from this heresy, I know of no other grave crimes committed by her."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс кашляет и тихо, едва слышно оттарабанивает:{/n} "Она из хладных торговцев — контрабандистов, промышляющих ксенотоварами. Помимо этой ереси о других, более тяжелых прегрешениях в ее исполнении не слышал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix coughs and says quickly and quietly,{/n} "She's a Cold Trader, a smuggler who deals in xenogoods. Apart from this heresy, I know of no other sins committed by her."
{n}Heinrix coughs and says quickly and quietly,{/n} "She's a Cold Trader, a smuggler who deals in xenogoods. Apart from this heresy, I know of no other sins committed by her."
{n}Heinrix coughs and says quickly and quietly,{/n} "She's a Cold Trader, a smuggler who deals in xeno-goods. Apart from this heresy, I know of no other sins committed by her."
{n}Heinrix coughs and says quickly and quietly,{/n} "She's a Cold Trader, a smuggler who deals in xeno-goods. Apart from this heresy, I know of no other sins committed by her."
{n}Heinrix coughs and says quickly and quietly,{/n} "She's a Cold Trader, a smuggler who deals in xenos artefacts. Apart from this heresy, I know of no other grave crimes committed by her."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスが咳をして、静かな声でまくしたてるように言う。{/n}「彼女は異種族のアーティファクトを主に取り扱う闇商人。この異端を除けば、彼女の犯した重罪は他にはないはず」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix coughs and says quickly and quietly,{/n} "She's a Cold Trader, a smuggler who deals in xenos artefacts. Apart from this heresy, I know of no other grave crimes committed by her."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスが咳をして、静かな声でまくしたてるように言う。{/n}「彼女は異種族のアーティファクトを主に取り扱う闇商人。この異端を除けば、彼女の犯した重罪は他にはないはず」

languages.text: {n}海因里希咳嗽一声，压低声音，在你耳旁飞快地说道。{/n}“她是一名冷市商人，是买卖异形造物的走私贩子。不过，据我所知，除了此项亵渎之举外，她没有其他严重的劣迹。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix coughs and says quickly and quietly,{/n} "She's a Cold Trader, a smuggler who deals in xenos artefacts. Apart from this heresy, I know of no other grave crimes committed by her."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希咳嗽一声，压低声音，在你耳旁飞快地说道。{/n}“她是一名冷市商人，是买卖异形造物的走私贩子。不过，据我所知，除了此项亵渎之举外，她没有其他严重的劣迹。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix tousse et vous chuchote rapidement :{/n} « C'est une experte du Commerce Froid, une contrebandière spécialisée dans les artefacts xénos. En dehors de cette hérésie, je ne lui connais aucun autre crime grave. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix coughs and says quickly and quietly,{/n} "She's a Cold Trader, a smuggler who deals in xenos artefacts. Apart from this heresy, I know of no other grave crimes committed by her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix tousse et vous chuchote rapidement :{/n} « C'est une experte du Commerce Froid, une contrebandière spécialisée dans les artéfacts xénos. En dehors de cette hérésie, je ne lui connais aucun autre crime grave. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix tose y espeta rápida y silenciosamente:{/n} «Es una comerciante fría, una contrabandista que se busca la vida con artefactos xenos. Aparte de tal herejía, no tengo constancia de que haya cometido delitos graves».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix coughs and says quickly and quietly,{/n} "She's a Cold Trader, a smuggler who deals in xenos artefacts. Apart from this heresy, I know of no other grave crimes committed by her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix tose y espeta rápida y silenciosamente:{/n} «Es una comerciante fría, una contrabandista que se busca la vida con artefactos xenos. Aparte de tal herejía, no tengo constancia de que haya cometido delitos graves».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hustet und sagt dann rasch und leise:{/n} "Sie ist eine Kalthändlerin, eine Schmugglerin, die mit Xenos-Artefakten handelt. Von dieser Ketzerei einmal abgesehen, sind mir keine anderen Kapitalverbrechen von ihr bekannt."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix coughs and says quickly and quietly,{/n} "She's a Cold Trader, a smuggler who deals in xenos artefacts. Apart from this heresy, I know of no other grave crimes committed by her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hustet und sagt dann rasch und leise:{/n} "Sie ist eine Kalthändlerin, eine Schmugglerin, die mit Xenos-Artefakten handelt. Von dieser Ketzerei einmal abgesehen, sind mir keine anderen Kapitalverbrechen von ihr bekannt."

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix coughs and says quickly and quietly,{/n} "She's a Cold Trader, a smuggler who deals in xenos artefacts. Apart from this heresy, I know of no other grave crimes committed by her."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix öksürüp hızlı ve sessiz bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu kadın, zeno eserlerinin kaçakçılığını yapan bir Soğuk Tacir. Bu kâfirlik dışında ağır bir suç işlediyse de bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix coughs and says quickly and quietly,{/n} "She's a Cold Trader, a smuggler who deals in xenos artefacts. Apart from this heresy, I know of no other grave crimes committed by her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix öksürüyor, hızlı ve sessiz bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu kadın, zeno eserlerinin kaçakçılığını yapan bir Soğuk Tacir. Bu kâfirlik dışında ağır bir suç işlediyse haberim yok."
